title: How BreathableBaby Mesh Crib Liners Work- What You Need to Know
description:
BreathableBaby 100% mesh crib liners use air channel technology to keep your baby sleeping comfortably all night long while preventing crib entanglement. Watch our demo video to see the benefits mesh crib liners can have on the health and safety of your little one. We provide detailed descriptions of the BreathableBaby product line and step by step installation instructions.

Our award winning, patented product design has been shown through independent tests to be significantly more permeable to air than a traditional bumper, effectively protecting your baby from the risk of suffocation. A perfect baby registry addition or gift for new parents, especially those with active sleepers!

Pediatrician evaluated and recommended. Recommended ages: 0-12 months.

Learn more about who we are and our safer alternatives to traditional crib bedding at https://breathablebaby.com/.

For additional product information, visit https://breathablebaby.com/shop/breathable-crib-liners/breathable-mesh-crib-liner/.
transcripts:
When it's time for your sweet little baby to rest, the peace and quiet part is nice for everyone. But mostly you just want her to be comfortable, and safe. The patented, and innovative, breathable baby crib liner, is made of a breathable mesh fabric, and wraps snugly around the rails of her crib, keeping little limbs safely inside, but still allowing fresh air to flow through. The breathable mesh fabric is designed with our exclusive ACT, air channeled technology, which maximizes air flow to reduce the risk of suffocation. 

Our breathable mesh has air pockets that allow for all around air flow. With superior air flow and construction, compared to other crib liners breathable baby liners are safety tested and approved. 

The breathable baby mesh crib liners come in 3 different styles of liners. The standard liner is simple and classic, available in solid and patterns, made with a single layer of breathable mesh. The Deluxe Cable Weave liner, with breathable textured mesh, and also available with fashionably embossed designs. The elegant Ultra Luxe Liner offers style with breathable textured fabrics, and even more luxurious finishing. 

And all breathable baby liners are machine washable, soft and comfortable, offering safe protection that's easy to install. Breathable baby crib liners come in 2 pieces, to allow for gap free coverage of your crib. They're made to fit both standard 4-side slatted, and solid back cribs. And they stay snug, thanks to adjustable fasteners. 

For you lucky parents of a climber, the liner sides will collapse if she tries to gain a foothold. In a world of constant changes, a safe and comfortable place to rest is a welcome refuge, for the whole family. Breathable baby liners provide exactly what you need, to keep your baby safer, and more comfortable day and night. Breathable baby, fresh air, safe sleep, sweet dreams.
